italic.text: A member of the Armed Forces assigned to accompany, assist, or guide an individual or group. An armed guard that accompanies a convoy, a train, prisoners, etc.

line.text: In SWORD, to accompany a unit toward a specific location in order to protect it against potenital enemies or other dangers. The agent transports the unit to bring it to the given destination. No round trips here. The transportation is done by a magic action. The agent does not need specific physical capabilities.

underlined.text: This mission is offensive. While escorting the unit, the agent that performs the mission will engage all perceived enemies in range

In this mission, only one unit will be the forward echelon: the commander agent issues the "Escort" mission to one units with the 'route' as parameter.
The commander agent issues the "combat support" mission to the engineer units, with the front unit as parameters.
Other units (reserve and non adapted units) receive the "follow" mission with the front units as parameter.
The mission ends when the escorting units has reached the meeting position.
